These partners range from large software suites like VMware vCenter, Microsoft System Center, and Red Hat to focused solution providers such as Morpheus, Chef, Red Hat, CANCOM, and others. By integrating with the unified API in HPE OneView, ISVs can provide solutions that reduce the time their customers spend managing their environments.
